name: BMenuItem
sample: <BIconButton leftIcon: null, primaryText: 'Temel Bankacılık', rightIcon: null, checked: false, disabled: false, focusState: 'none', insetChildren: false/></IconButton>

infoArray.name: leftIcon
infoArray.desc: The SvgIcon or FontIcon to be displayed on the left side.

infoArray.name: primaryText
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render primary text within the menu item.

infoArray.name: primaryTextPadding
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render primary text  padding within the menu item.

infoArray.name: secondaryText
infoArray.desc: Can be used to render secondary text within the menu item.

infoArray.name: rightIcon
infoArray.desc: The SvgIcon or FontIcon to be displayed on the right side.

infoArray.name: checked
infoArray.desc: If true, a left check mark will be rendered.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: classname for font iconIf true, the menu item will be disabled.

infoArray.name: itemSelected
infoArray.desc: Callback function fired when the menu item is item selected.
